By holding down the` back' button, users can also see all their recently accessed applications, allowing them to switch easily between them. People want a phone that makes information much more accessible, said Steve Ballmer ( above).`` The market has been swamped with phones with fairly similar design. Users just see a sea of icons. severance pay. The prime minister's spokesman confirmed Andy Coulson had left No 10 for good at this morning's daily lobby briefing. Asked whether a replacement had been found, the spokesman said: I think we are making good progress on that. When we are in a position to make an announcement we will make one. I wouldn't say it is imminent. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
